oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The dream of D !kw in, before he received news of his father s death. Further omens, etc. In the Katkop dialect by D !kw in (L V.

5146). Dia!kwain dreams that he and his father are cutting up a sheep and a Dutch man ('Boer') threatens to beat them to death for killing the sheep. Dia!kwain awakes at daybreak and tells his wife that the dream had spoken like a person, of things that would come true. Dia!kwain's mother comes to tell him his father has died.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The dream which Dia!kwain had before he received the tidings of the death of his father
